channel.title: Configuration file '/etc/tor/torrc.anondist' issue
channel.description:
I received such message today after **sudo apt full-upgrade** on Whonix Gateway under Virtual Box. What should I choose in this situation?
``` Configuration file '/etc/tor/torrc.anondist' ==> Modified (by you or by a script) since installation. ==> Package distributor has shipped an updated version. What would you like to do about it ? Your options are: Y or I : install the package maintainer's version N or O : keep your currently-installed version D : show the differences between the versions Z : start a shell to examine the situation The default action is to keep your current version. *** torrc.anondist (Y/I/N/O/D/Z) [default=N] ? d --- /etc/tor/torrc.anondist 2022-08-10 16:32:41.666905253 +0000 +++ /etc/tor/torrc.anondist.dpkg-new 2015-10-21 00:00:00.000000000 +0000 @@ -3,6 +3,3 @@ ## /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/50_user.conf
%include /etc/torrc.d/*.conf -\ -# The following line has been added by /usr/libexec/helper-scripts/repair-torrc -%include /etc/torrc.d/*.conf*.conf ```

item.title: Configuration file '/etc/tor/torrc.anondist' issue
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Install. And then please confirm it looks same as this:

github.com

Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/blob/master/etc/tor/torrc.anondist

## Do not edit this file!
## Please create and add modifications to the following file instead:
## /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/50_user.conf

%include /etc/torrc.d/*.conf

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/master/etc/tor/torrc.anondist

Read full topic

item.title: Configuration file '/etc/tor/torrc.anondist' issue
item.dc:creator: IMV
item.description:
I received such message today after sudo apt full-upgrade on Whonix Gateway under Virtual Box. What should I choose in this situation?

Configuration file '/etc/tor/torrc.anondist'
 ==> Modified (by you or by a script) since installation.
 ==> Package distributor has shipped an updated version.
   What would you like to do about it ?  Your options are:
    Y or I  : install the package maintainer's version
    N or O  : keep your currently-installed version
      D     : show the differences between the versions
      Z     : start a shell to examine the situation
 The default action is to keep your current version.
*** torrc.anondist (Y/I/N/O/D/Z) [default=N] ? d
--- /etc/tor/torrc.anondist     2022-08-10 16:32:41.666905253 +0000
+++ /etc/tor/torrc.anondist.dpkg-new    2015-10-21 00:00:00.000000000 +0000
@@ -3,6 +3,3 @@
 ## /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/50_user.conf
 
 %include /etc/torrc.d/*.conf
-\
-# The following line has been added by /usr/libexec/helper-scripts/repair-torrc
-%include /etc/torrc.d/*.conf*.conf

Read full topic
